TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAuthenticationModule

summary.span: 为 Web 客户端身份验证模块提供基本身份验证接口。

span.span: Provides the base authentication interface for Web client authentication modules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义的属性和自定义身份验证模块必须使用的方法。The interface defines the properties and methods that custom authentication modules must use. 身份验证模块进行适当的身份验证质询响应的服务器的整个身份验证过程。Authentication modules conduct the entire authentication process with a server, responding to an authentication challenge as appropriate. 此过程可能会包含请求的资源服务器，以及正确地请求身份验证的 uri 所需的任何其他活动从单独的身份验证服务器。This process may consist of requests to an authentication server separate from the resource server, as well as any other activities required to properly authenticate a request for a URI. 自定义身份验证模块应实现接口，然后使用注册方法。Custom authentication modules should implement the interface and then register with the method. 身份验证模块还会读取配置文件在程序初始化时注册。Authentication modules are also registered at program initialization by reading the configuration file. ## Examples 下面的示例创建通过实现将创建一个自定义身份验证类接口。The following example creates creates a customized authentication class by implementing the interface. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Authorization Authenticate (string challenge, System.Net.WebRequest request, System.Net.ICredentials credentials);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.Authorization Authenticate(string challenge, class System.Net.WebRequest request, class System.Net.ICredentials credentials) cil managed
Public Function Authenticate (challenge As String, request As WebRequest, credentials As ICredentials) As Authorization
public: System::Net::Authorization ^ Authenticate(System::String ^ challenge, System::Net::WebRequest ^ request, System::Net::ICredentials ^ credentials);
abstract member Authenticate : string * System.Net.WebRequest * System.Net.ICredentials -> System.Net.Authorization

param.name: challenge
param.span: 服务器发送的身份验证质询。

span.span: The authentication challenge sent by the server.

param.name: request
param.span: 与质询关联的 实例。

span.span: The instance associated with the challenge.
The credentials associated with the challenge.

summary.span: 返回 类的一个实例以响应来自服务器的身份验证质询。

span.span: Returns an instance of the class in respose to an authentication challenge from a server.

returns.span: 一个 实例，包含有关请求的授权消息；如果无法处理质询，则包含 。

span.span: An instance containing the authorization message for the request, or if the challenge cannot be handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行与服务器身份验证过程，并返回实例向。The method conducts the authentication process with the server and returns an instance to the . ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#3)]

span.para: 调用上注册的身份验证模块，以确定哪些模块处理这一难题的方法。如果身份验证模块无法处理这方面的挑战方法必须返回。如果身份验证模块进行身份验证过程时遇到错误必须引发异常。

The calls the method on registered authentication modules to determine which module handles the challenge. If the authentication module cannot handle the challenge, the method must return . If the authentication module encounters an error while conducting the authentication process, must throw an exception.

.property instance string AuthenticationType
Public ReadOnly Property AuthenticationType As String
public: property System::String ^ AuthenticationType { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.AuthenticationType : string

summary.span: 获取此身份验证模块提供的身份验证类型。

span.span: Gets the authentication type provided by this authentication module.

value.span: 指示此身份验证模块提供的身份验证类型的字符串。

span.span: A string indicating the authentication type provided by this authentication module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识此身份验证模块实现的身份验证类型。The property identifies the authentication type implemented by this authentication module. 属性可供方法以确定是否已注册的身份验证模块，以及通过方法中删除注册的身份验证模块。The property is used by the method to determine if the authentication module has been registered, and by the method to remove a registered authentication module. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#7)]

.property instance bool CanPreAuthenticate
Public ReadOnly Property CanPreAuthenticate As Boolean
public: property bool CanPreAuthenticate { bool get(); };
member this.CanPreAuthenticate : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示身份验证模块是否支持预身份验证。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the authentication module supports preauthentication.

value.span: 如果授权模块支持预身份验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the authorization module supports preauthentication; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为`true`以指示身份验证模块可以响应使用有效实例时调用方法。The property is set to `true` to indicate that the authentication module can respond with a valid instance when the method is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性。The following example shows how to use the property. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#7)]

span.para: 这通常是一个固定的值;身份验证模块可以进行预身份验证，或者它不能。
This is typically a fixed value; either the authentication module can preauthenticate, or it cannot.

param.span: 与身份验证请求关联的 实例。

span.span: The instance associated with the authentication request.

param.span: 与身份验证请求关联的凭据。

span.span: The credentials associated with the authentication request.

summary.span: 为对服务器的的身份验证请求返回 类的一个实例。

span.span: Returns an instance of the class for an authentication request to a server.

returns.span: 包含有关请求的授权消息的 实例。

span.span: An instance containing the authorization message for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，则方法将返回的实例类包含的身份验证消息。When the property is `true`, the method will return an instance of the class containing an authentication message. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 有关完整示例，请参阅类。For a complete example refer to the class. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Authentication#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CPP/custombasicauthentication.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Authentication#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/CS/custombasicauthentication.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Authentication#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Authentication/VB/custombasicauthentication.vb#4)]
